channel.title: Comments on: Black Horses are Nazgul-Only

item.description: "Those graphics look like dog shit to me." - you got the point lol
item.content:encoded: “Those graphics look like dog shit to me.” – you got the point lol

item.title: By: LostMyFirstGoldPiece
item.dc:creator: LostMyFirstGoldPiece
item.content:encoded:
From Chris: “Im at level 20 now and about to hit the 1 gold mark ”

You’re ripe for the 1 gold buyout scam in the Auction House. Unscrupulous vendors will put a few hides up for sale for a small bid with a buyout of 1g 4s 20c, hoping you will jump at the seemingly low buyout without noticing the 1g kicker. If you have a gold then the buyout works, and you have no recourse.

Hope Turbine adds an optional buyout confirmation window to the AH.

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: Good to know. Every time to go off to farm I seem to pick heavily quested areas. I'm at level 20 now and about to hit the 1 gold mark so I won't sweat it too much. Unfortunately I'm apparently more skilled at dying than you are apparently. I'll have to work out the difference there.
item.content:encoded: Good to know. Every time to go off to farm I seem to pick heavily quested areas. I’m at level 20 now and about to hit the 1 gold mark so I won’t sweat it too much. Unfortunately I’m apparently more skilled at dying than you are apparently. I’ll have to work out the difference there.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
I was a cheap bastard until lvl 35, didn't die in instances a whole ton (i.e. huge repair bills), didn't buy or sell anything on the AH (i.e. lazy) and I was at about 3 gold, 800 silver when I dinged 35. I spent an hour killing orcs and gobs for a deed and did a couple solo quests to get the rest of the cash.
If I was smarter, I would have had the cash right away, but was easy enough to farm the rest.
item.content:encoded:
I was a cheap bastard until lvl 35, didn’t die in instances a whole ton (i.e. huge repair bills), didn’t buy or sell anything on the AH (i.e. lazy) and I was at about 3 gold, 800 silver when I dinged 35. I spent an hour killing orcs and gobs for a deed and did a couple solo quests to get the rest of the cash.

If I was smarter, I would have had the cash right away, but was easy enough to farm the rest.

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: I'm estimating about a month before I'm 35. How difficult did you find it to make the money needed for your mount? I'm miserly in the Auction House and a gatherer, but I'm trying to decide whether or not to do a bit of side farming to make sure I've got the cash when mount time comes.
item.content:encoded: I’m estimating about a month before I’m 35. How difficult did you find it to make the money needed for your mount? I’m miserly in the Auction House and a gatherer, but I’m trying to decide whether or not to do a bit of side farming to make sure I’ve got the cash when mount time comes.
